title: Olly Murs looks strikingly different as he switches his brown hair for ice blonde locks

Olly Murs looked unrecognisable as he rocked the red carpet for The Voice launch at Media City in Manchester on Monday night.

The former X Factor contestant, 35, caused fans to do a double take as he unveiled his striking new look.

Oozing confidence as he happily posed for snaps with onlookers, the Dance With Me Tonight musician sported a head of ice blonde hair - a major transformation from the mousy tones he has had since shooting to fame in 2009.

Continuing his red carpet look, Olly styled up a black suit teamed with a crisp white shirt which featured silver stud detailing on the collar.

The Witham native was joined at the event by his fellow The Voice judges - Sir Tom Jones, Meghan Trainor and Will.i.am.

As to be expected, Sir Tom, 79, put on a suave display in a silver baroque blazer paired with grey trousers and a black shirt.

(Image: MCPIX/REX)

US rapper and producer Will.i.am, 44, showcased his quirky sense of style in a pea green knitted hat, sunglasses and a navy blue overcoat with mustard coloured lapels.

Meghan, 25, ensured she dazzled by slipping into form-fitting black leggings alongside a glittering blouse that was decorated with an extravagant tulle collar and em encrusted neckline.

Meanwhile, Olly's love life is said to be blossoming.

The singer is said to be getting cosy with a stunning bodybuilder after sliding into her Instagram DMs.

(Image: MCPIX/REX)

(Image: MCPIX/REX)

He first noticed finance girl Amelia Tank on the social media site and wasn't shy about introducing himself.

Olly and the 27-year-old, nicknamed Tank the Bank thanks to her punishing double daily weight sessions and workout schedule, are reportedly going steady.

Now The Sun say a holiday together could be around the corner after a two months of dating.

“Amelia’s Instagram feed caught his eye and they started swapping flirty messages," a source said.

(Image: MCPIX/REX)

"They met up at an Essex gym in July and the chemistry was instant. Olly thought Amelia was gorgeous, and she was very impressed by him too.

“They agreed to a date and since then the romance has been going well.

"They wanted to keep things quiet at first but three months down the line they are more relaxed about people knowing they are together.

“They went for a low-key date in a pub recently and were spotted getting quite cosy there.”
